name: Stephen Mann
content: Stephen Mann's Contact Info DC 2317, David R. Cheriton School of Computer Science University of Waterloo 200 University Ave W Waterloo, Ontario N2L 3G1 CANADA Work: (226) 507-2162 FAX: (519) 885-1208 smann@uwaterloo.ca My email often gets tagged as spam, so if you want a reply from me, be sure to add me to your white list/contact/whatever-your-mailer-calls-it and to check your spam folder for a few days. Information on applying to graduate studies in CGL. Note: I rarely reply to direct inquiries about graduate school from non-Canadian students that I do not know.
